price: 24. y dijo: “Esto (el Corán) no es sino hechicería que le ha sido transmitida (a Muhammad);
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
